entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 25 except 15 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. 30 percent chance of showers inland late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 25 except 15 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 20 except 15 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
